sentences.en: A slim, pointed piece of metal hammered into material as a fastener.
sentences.cn: 一细的尖头金属,用于楔入某物,如图钉.

sentences.en: Fastener is a hardware tool that puts together two or more objects.
sentences.cn: 紧固件是一种硬件工具,拼两个或多个对象.

sentences.en: He's ( He has ) nipped his thumb in the fastener.
sentences.cn: 他的姆指被钩扣夹住了.

sentences.en: Install push - in fastener holding center of fascia to rear closure panel.
sentences.cn: 安装中心面板紧固到后罩盘上的推进式固定件.

sentences.en: Large fastener importer seeking a Mechanical Plating Quality Engineer.
sentences.cn: 大型的螺丝进口商欲招聘机械镀锌区域质检工程师.

sentences.en: Roll the seatback cover downward and engage the hook and loop fastener.
sentences.cn: 向下旋转座椅背盖,安装钩环固定器.

sentences.en: Sadly , the original fastener , invented in 1893 by Whitcomb L.
sentences.cn: 1893年芝加哥工程师威特科姆?L?贾德森发明了拉链.

sentences.en: Sadly , the original zip fastener , invented in 1893 by Whitcomb L.
sentences.cn: 1893年芝加哥工程师威特科姆·L·贾德森发明了拉链.

sentences.en: Shanghai Yixuan Auto Fastener Company line standard and specialized fastener distributor.
sentences.cn: 上海宜轩汽车标准件有限公司专业经营各类紧固件,位于上海市嘉定区.

sentences.en: Suitable for cutting hook & Loop fastener , elastics, plastic zipper paper, plastics.
sentences.cn: 本机适于粘扣带, 松紧带, 塑胶拉练,纸带,塑胶带,排线, 套管.

sentences.en: The fastener on her skirt broke.
The zip fastener had long since been wrenched out of them.
These earrings snap on with special fastener.
sentences.cn: 这付耳环是用特制的按扣扣上去的.

sentences.en: Threaded fastener is the important type among all the fasteners.
sentences.cn: 螺纹连接件是紧固件中重要的类型.

sentences.en: Your blouse is open because the fastener is broken.
sentences.cn: 你的衬衫松开了,因为钮扣坏了.

使固定；集中于；扎牢；强加于

trans.tran_cn: 紧固件，钮扣，钮扣，使系牢之物
trans.tran_en: something that you use to join something together, such as a button on a piece of clothing
